list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the curved sickle shape of the waxing or waning moon.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the moon was a slender crescent
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mặt trăng là một lưỡi liềm mảnh mai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing that has has the shape of a single curve, especially one that is broad in the center and tapers to a point at each end.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a three-mile crescent of golden sand
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một lưỡi liềm ba dặm của cát vàng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: having the shape of a crescent.
